login.title: Welcome to {{name}}
login.comment: Please enter your credentials to log-in
login.signininstead: Already have an account? Sign in instead.
login.resetPasswordText: Please enter the e-mail address of the account for which you have forgotten the password
login.resetPasswordMailSend: We have sent the password reset link to your e-mail address. You can create your new password by clicking the link in the Mail.
login.resetPasswordMailFail: Could not send password reset mail
login.unlockplease: You have been directed to the lock screen for a long period of inactivity. Please enter your password to login again.

errorcodes.no_network_interface: Network information could not be obtained
errorcodes.unauthorized_only_allowed_login_on_app: You can only log in through the app.

validation.notvalid: The expression you entered in the {{field}} field is invalid.
validation.maxString: The {{field}} must contain a maximum of {{number}} characters
